headline: AI stocks are in a bear market, strategist says: How to play the space
summary: Tech stocks have been pummeled in the recent market downturn. Morningstar Chief US market strategist David Sekera argues that AI stocks, specifically, are in a bear market as a result. However, that decline means some stocks may now be more attractive to potential investors. Find out which ones Sekera likes in the video above. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

headline: Reflecting On Automation Software Stocks’ Q4 Earnings: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW)
summary: Wrapping up Q4 earnings, we look at the numbers and key takeaways for the automation software stocks, including ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) and its peers.
